channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road still partially flooded, 3rd December
item.description:
Road partially flooded as it opens after bends coming from the Staverton junction. This has not resolved since the Storm Bert weekend so presumably the drains are blocked. Dangerous as hard to see in dark and neccessitates moving out onto the oncoming carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

Outside number 23 Pilley Lane

item.title: Tree canopy remains below height of bin and delivery vehicles. Tree branches still regularly falling into road/footpath - risk of injury to pedestrians and damage to vehicles/3rd party property. The tree needs to be maintained to control canopy extents and remove dead branches. Land owner is unknown but trees overhanging carriageway need attention.., 3rd December
item.description:
Tree canopy between Hendre and Kingston apartments which overhangs Overton Park Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Overton Park Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New manhole cover fitted recently is loose fitting making loud noise when vehicles go over it, 3rd December

item.title: Large pothole on left hand side of road as heading up to top of lane, 3rd December
item.description:
There is a large pothole - amongst others - on the left hand side of the road as you are heading up to the top of the lane towards Barnwood Trust building. It is just after the rear entrance to Riverhill apartments car park. It has been there for a few months but has got worse recently. The lane is used by a lot of people particularly GCC staff exiting County Offices and the car park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Lane, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
